info.no-meetings: There are no meetings currently available
info.define-group: You can define a user group for this voting event. Only users of this voting group will be able to see it.
info.question-visibility: The questions won't be visible until the question is started
info.names-available-for: Names of all participants and their votes will be available for:
info.answer-explanations: You can decide if voters will be asked to confirm their decision. You have the possibility to edit the confirmation below
info.polls-will-appear: The question will appear on the screen when it's published.
info.polls-will-be-invisible: The questions won’t be visible untill the poll will start.
info.polls-activation-explaination: In the question queue you can see the list of questions that have been added to the event. In order to activate a question for users - press “Publish this question”. To deactivate this event session press “Close this question” at the bottom of this section.
info.publish-poll: By pressing “Publish this question” you’ll make it visible for all the users in this question event and they can vote on it.
info.republish-poll: By pressing “Republish this question” the previous results of this question will be deleted and this question will appear for the voters to vote again.
info.close-poll: By pressing “Close this question” you’ll close this question for all voters, they won’t have possibility to vote any longer.
info.poll-anonymous: This question is anonymous and the participants are hidden for this question
info.results-will-be-visible: Thank you for participating in this poll! The results will be avaliable for the next few days on the homescreen.
